meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with globe-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The globeflowers in the garden are so round and pretty.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of colorful globeflowers for her mother.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns among the globeflowers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a field of blooming globeflowers.
meanings.sent5: The globeflowers swayed gently in the breeze, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The round flower of a globeflower plant.
meanings.sent1: Each globeflower was a burst of color in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The bees buzzed happily around the fragrant globeflowers.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended the globeflowers were tiny fairy umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of blooming globeflowers.
meanings.sent5: The globeflowers seemed to dance in the sunlight, bringing joy to all who saw them.
